name: AIO Video Downloader
tagline: AIO Downloader is a android software that's helps you to download any files from Internet with a very high efficient way and also helps you to save and watch online videos at offline, without internet connection. It can save almost any online videos available on the Internet.
body:
### Welcome to AIO Download Manager ( AIO )

AIO Downloader is a android software that's helps you to save and watch online videos at offline, without internet connection. It can save almost any online videos available on the Internet. Some popular website are available on its home screen for quick access. Such as YouTube, Vimeo, DailyMotion, Veho, Break, Keek etc.*

Apps key features are..

1 Web Browser
* Automatically capture video files form web pages.
* Tap on a video to download the video file.
* Integrated Google search.
* Ability to change browser's User-Agent.

2 Download Manager
* Super fast Downloading.
* Support multiple downloading at a same time.
* Live download progress bar and speed indicator.
* Support background download.
* Support pause, resume and cancel on download tasks.
* Show download progress Indicator notification.

3 Other Features
* Its a free app.
* Easy to use UI.
* Support music and other file download.
* Ability to get open from other apps.
* Other apps can call AIO to download video files(e.g. Email app can call AIO to download any file attachments).

[Privacy Policy of AIO Video Downloader](Privacy Policy of AIO Video Downloader)

### Want to contribute to the project ?  
Anyone who are interested to see the code or want to improve the quality of the app or just want to add a new feature is welcome. You can easily do contribute to this project by pulling your pulling request.

### Authors and Contributors
The list of the contributers are not small but I can link some on github who are contributing to the project.
@devmkj

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the App ? Please do contact us at shiba.spj@hotmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
